Re tlohele masaona.

title: Oho Movirigo ea hloekileng
lyrics:
1
Oho Movirigo,
Ea hloekileng,
Ea se nang sekoli.

Chorus
Utloa thapelo
Ea ban aba hao,
Utloa, utloa, ‘M’a rona.
‘me ea ratehang,
‘Me ea makatsang,
Ea matla leholimong.

2
U mosireletsi
Ea tshepehang,
Ea tletseng mosa ruri.

3
U re namolele
Lintoeng tsohle
Tsa rona le e mobe.

4
U hlokile sebe
Hlahong ea hao
Re thuse re se hloee.

5
U n’u khobe hloho
Ea Satane,
Re thuse re mo hlole.

6
‘Me, re tla ho uena
Re tshepile
Oa hao mosa le matla.

title: Oho Movirigo Maria!
lyrics:
1
Oho Movirigo Maria,
Re se re tlile ho Uena,
Utloa lifela tsa rona
Rea u boka, oh ‘M’a rona

Chorus
Mofumahali oa leholimo
Inkele meea ea rona,
U e hotetse ka lerato,
U e nehele Morena.

2
Bitso la hao, oho Maria,
Le thabisa hamonate
Ka hanong ke linotsi.
Le ngoloe ka pelong tsa rona

3
U re matlafatse lipelo,
Le lefung u re khothatse
Ka lerato le ka mosa,
‘Me u re fihlise ho Jesu.

4
‘Me ha re ka phela ka khotso
Nakong ea bophelo ba rona,
Ke hoba uena, Maria,
U re thusitse ka thapelo.

5
Ua re rata, ‘Me ea monate;
Esita mona telekong,
Ho tla ba joang maholimong!
Moo re tla u bona kannete!

title: Oho Ngoan’eso!
lyrics:
1
Oho ngoan’eso! U ee ka khotso
Ho ‘Mopi oa hao
Ea u bitsitseng kajeno
U s’uphethile
La hao leeto
U tla phomola
Ka eo hle mehla

2
Uena u tsoile
Tsietsing tsena
Tsa fatshe lena
U phethile thomo ea hao
U s’u ea mane
Motseng oa khotso
Le oa phomolo

3
E, re bohloko
Re lla meokho
Ka lefu la hao
Hoba u re amohiloe
Ho etsoe thato
Ea ‘Mopi oa hao
‘Me e rorisoe
Ka mehla eohle

4
Tsamaea hantle
Oho motsoalle
U boele hae
Re roballe moo lebitleng
U tlo u tsohe
Ka la bofeloMohl’a kahlolo
Ea batho bohle

5
Oho Maria
Uena ‘Ma rona
Ak’u mo thuse
A tsoe kapele mahlokong
A kene thabong
Ea leholimo
Moo a tla lula
Le bakhethuoa

title: Oho Pelo e nolo
lyrics:
1
Oho, pelo e nolo,
Ea ‘Moloki oa rona,
Mamela lithapelo
Ha re tlile ho uena.

2
Jesu, uena ea matla,
‘Moloki oa lefatshe,
Re fe ka mehla matla
A ho tlohela tse mpe.
3
Pelo ea hao, Morena,
E be thebe ea batho,
Pholoho le seliba,
Seliba sa mehlolo.

4
Oho Pelo e nolo
Ea Morena oa rona,
Ka mehla re tla bina.
Mosa oa hao le thoko.

5
Re boloke, Morena,
Ka matla le ka mehla,
Re balehele sebe,
Re boloke bohloeki.

6
U rorisoe, Morena,
U rorisoe kahohle,
U ratoe fatsheng lena,
‘Me u ratoe ke bohle!

title: Oho Pelo ea Jesu
lyrics:
1
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
Prlo ea Morena
E monate e matla
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
O  re amohele kajeno

Chorus
Rona bahlanka ba hao Morena
U re fe matla re tla u sebeletsa
Re u rorise ka ketso tse ntle
Ho fihlela lefu la rona

2
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
Re ntse re tsekisoa
‘Me re loantshoa ke lira
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
U re sireletse kajeno

3
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
Re ntse re fokola
Re ema har’a tsela
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
U re matlafatse kajeno

4
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
Re na le melato
E silafatsang pelo
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
Tlo, u re hloekise kajeno

5
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
Re se re tshabela
Ka ho uena Morena
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
U tla loanela kajeno

6
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
re tlile ho uena
Hoba rea u tshepa
Oho Pelo ea Jesu
Re se re le ba hao kajeno

title: Oho uena Jesu
lyrics:
Chorus
Oho uena, Jesu, u re utloe,
Ba ahileng Lesotho, U ba pholose hle!

1
E, Morena rea tseba ka ‘nete,
Pelo ea hao e rata Basotho;
Ponahatso e ‘ngoe ha re e hloke,
Oho Jesu! Re bone kajeno.

2
Ke eona he tshepo e ntle ea rona,
Ha re tlile ka tlung ea Molimo;
Re tsebile hoba u tla re utloa;
Oho, Jesu! re etsa thapelo.

3
Kajeno hle, u talima Basotho:
Ba bangata ba sa le mafifing,
Ba sa lutes matsohong a Ra-lefu,
Oho Jesu! ba kene leseling.

4
Ba bang ba teng, bona ke bakhelohi
Ba thetsitsoeng ke sera sa batho,
Le bona hle, u ba tsebise ‘nete,
Oho Jesu! ba lahle mashano.

5
Pelo ea hao e soabile ka ‘nete
Hoba ba bang e n’e le bakriste,
‘Me joale ke bakoenehi ba babe;
Oho Jesu! U ba khutlise hle.

6
Le mohlapeng o nang le botshepehi
linku tsa hao li loke tsohle,
Hoba tse ling ke tse sa tshabeng sebe;
Oho Jesu! tsena u li khanne!

7
Kaofela batho rea fokola.
Meleko e re lihela fatshe.
Pelo ea hao e tla re matlafatsa;
Oho Jesu! re tiee ka ‘nete!

8
Oho, uena Morena ea leng mohau!
pelong ea hao u re amohele!
Teng re tla ba ruri Basotho ba hao,
Oho Jesu! ho se ho felile

title: Oho uena Josefa
lyrics:
1
Oho uena Josefa,
Ea leng ntat’a rona,
Re ipeha ho uena,
U tla re boloka.

Chorus
Ntat’a rona, u re utloe!

2
U n’u boloka Jesu
Hona moo lefatsheng,
U boloke le batho
Hohle litsietsing.

3
Le ho sera se khopo,
U n’u malehise,
A ko u etse joalo
Ha re oela sebeng.

4
U ile ua baballa
Jesu hamonate;
Re tshepile ho uena,
Re baballe hantle.

5
E, re behile tshepo
Ho uena Josefa
Ka baka la lerato
Leo u nang le lona.

title: Oho, uena ea leng maholimong
lyrics:
1
Oho, uena ea leng maholimong,
Uena Ntate, Molimo oa rona,
U talime bana ba hao ka mosa
Ke bona ba phuthehang thapelong.

2
Lebitso la hao le halalelang
Ho se be ea tlaelang ka lona;
Le hlonepshoe ka lifubeng tsa rona
Le rapeloe ke ba sa lumeleng.

3
Ke uena Mong’a rona u inotsi,
Ea nehang matla le ho Morena
Pelong ea ka le holim’a lichaba
Ho tle ‘Muso oa hao monate.

4
Thato ea hao e etsoe ke bohle
Kamoo ba e laetsoeng melaong
Re etsise bona ba leholimo
Ba u mamela ka pelo tse ntle

5
Re tsebe hore ua re baballa;
E, Morena, ke uena ‘m’a rona;
Le kajeno re sa kopa ho uena
Bohobe bo lekanang letsatsi.

6
Re tshwarele melato ea rona
E ka re arohanyang le uena;
‘Me le rona re tla tshwarela bohle
Re tsamaeeng mehlaleng ea Kriste.

7
Morena! Ak’u re sireletse
Har’a meleko ea bademone;
U re ntshe bobeng, u re ise botleng
Leholimong, khotsong e sa feleng.

title: Oho! banabeso hle!
lyrics:
1
Oho! banabeso hle!
Re batleng pholoho!
Ka mehla re hopoleng
E le setshabelo

Chorus
Ea nang le poloko
O ruile tsohle
O na le lehlohonolo
Le fetisang tsohle

2
‘Me le ha re ka rua
Re sa le lefatsheng
Ha moea o timela
Na re tla thusoa ke’ng?

3
Re tsebeng, taba ena
Ke lentsoe la Jesu
O re bolella lona
Rona banab’eso

4
Ea ratang ho fihlisa
Moea oa hae botleng
U tshoanetse ho etsa
Ketso tse lokileng

5
Re tla ea leholimong
Ha re ka pholoha
Empa re tla ea mollong
Ha re ka lahleha

title: Oho! Monna
lyrics:
1
Oho! Monna ea tshepehileng
Oa Maria ea hloekileng,
Molebeli oa Ngoana Jesu
Ea bokhabane haholo,
Mopatriareka ntat’a rona,
Setloholo sa marena,
Bolebeling ba hao bo matla
Kajeno rea ipeha.

Chorus
Bakriste hopolang Josefa,
Le ithabeleng ka eena;
Le lona mangeloi le tlatse
Ka fela tsa lona tse ntle.

2
Ka mohlomong eena Josefa
A eteloa ke khosana,
Lengeloi le tsoang paradising,
A beheloa tsa sephiring,
Ha thoe: oho! Mor’a Davida,
Se tshabe ho nka Maria
Hoba se emotsoeng ke eena
Ke se emmotsoeng ke Moea.

3
Oho! Bonang joale, ba heso,
MOrena oa rona Jesu
Ha a s’a ipehile mofo
Ka hlonepho le mamelo,
O rongoa hohle ke Josefa,
‘Me kamehla, oa mamela;
Ke boikokobetso bo joang!
Ea ka ikhantshang na ke mang?

4
Oho Josefa! rea tshepa,
U tla ‘n’u be ntat’a rona
Re ipeha matsohong a hao
E, re tla ba ban aba hao.
Ho chehiloe hohle lefatsheng,
Re ka khetshemela sebeng;
Empa u tla re halaletsa
Re bana, rea fokola.

title: Oho! Nako
lyrics:
1
Oho nako e bokhabane
Ruri o s’a tlile Jesu
Ke ‘Moloki oa batho bohle
Mosa oa hae o moholo.

Chorus
A re roriseng, a re leboheng,
Lerato le fetisisang,
E! ka tumelo binang lithoko.
Tsa Molimo ea ratehang,
Tsa Molimo ea ratehang,

2
Mona, setulong sa lerato
O tshelisa hamonate,
Joale o re tlisetsa khotso
E, khotso ea paradise.

3
Che, lialuma tse tshabehang
Mona ha li utloahale;
Matla a hae a fetisisang
A patiloe ka sebele.

4
Bana, re ke re atameleng
O rata pelo tsa rona.
Oho hle, e be tse hloekileng.
Li se ke tsa silafala.

5
Lebitso la hae le leholo
Le ke le tumisoe hohle
Le borena ba hae kajeno
Bo tsejoe ‘me bo tlotlisoe.

title: Oho! Re bineng
lyrics:
1
Oho! Re bineng lineho tsa Jesu ea mosa!
Oho re bineng! Li monate, ‘me li ngata.
Eena o itlisitse lipelong tsa rona:
Oho! e joang menate ea ho amohela.

Chorus
Oho! Re bineng lineho tsa Jesu ea mosa!
Oho! Re bineng li monate ‘me li ngata.

2
Oho Morena! Ke u adora ke khutsitse;
Oho Morena! U Ntate, Molimo oa me!
Efela Eukariste ke sephiri ho ‘na;
Lerato le mpontshitse hobane ke uena.

3
Monghali oa ka, moea oa ka ke oa hao ruri;
Monghali oa ka, ke u tshepa u inotsi,
Leha lihele tsohle li ka mphutuhela,
Ke lutes ke tshepile, Jesu o ka ho ‘na.

4
Ke tla boka joang mehauhelo ea hao eohle na?
Ke tla boka joang? Ke tla ba oa hao ka mehla!
Ka na ka hlasimoha, ka utloa monate
Mohla ke neng ke qala ho tseba Monghali.

5
Oho Molimo! Letsoho la hao le be ho ‘na!
Oho Molimo! Ke se ke ka silafala!
U ile ua nkalosa e sa le ke phela;
U mpatlele bohloeka u putse ntoa ea ka!

title: Pelo-nolo (Cor dulce)
lyrics:
1
Pelo-nolo e ratehang,
Eo lerato le u hlabang,
Oho Jesu ea re shoetseng,
U ratoe hohle lefatsheng.

2
Moahloli oa halefa,
Ha re sebeletsa lira;
Puo feela ea hao Jesu,
E mo kokobetsa pelo.

3
Ke hobane ka maroba
A Pelo ea hao, u roba
Kubu e loketseng sebe
Sa rona majala-tse-mpe.

4
Pelo ea hao e hlabiloeng
Ke rato le phethehileng
La ba leketletseng lefung,
Ke eona thebe ea rona.

5
Re balehela ho uena,
Hobane re mafutsanaa:
Ke uena ruo la batho
Ba imetsoeng ke melato.

6
Morena re amohele
Selibeng sa pelo e ntle
Ea hao, e re fineletsang
Ka rato le re pholosang.

7
Tlotliso ho uena Jesu,
Ea ithuhelang lipelo
Ka rato le sa ithateng:
U bokoe ka bosafeleng.

title: Re atametse
lyrics:
1
Re atametse ho uena Morena
Re khothatsoa hoba u ntata rona
Ka tshabo le tshepo rea u rapela
E, boholo ba hao bo ananeloe

2
U entse leholimo le lefatshe
Le lintho tsohle u li hlahisitse
Ua laela feela, tsa ba tsa hlaha
E, boholo ba hao bo ananeloe

3
U Molimo ea se nang le ho qala
U Molimo ea se nang le ho fela
‘Me tsohle li re hlahela ka uena
E, boholo ba hao bo ananeloe

4
U n’u re bope ka setshoantsho sa hao
Efela re bone lerato la hao
U ntat’a rona hle! U ntat’a rona
E, boholo ba hao bo ananeloe

5
U re etselitse ho rata uena
Le ka pelo le ka matla a rona
‘Musong oa hao re tle re be le uena
E, boholo ba hao bo ananeloe

title: Re bineng hammoho
lyrics:
Chorus
Re bineng hammoho,
Maria ‘M’a Molimo;
Re etseng ka thabo,
Tsa ‘M’a rona lithoko.

1
Ka khoeli ea Maria,
A se le monate!
Ka matsatsi-tsatsi
Re bonela ‘M’a rona.

2
Re batleng lipalesa
Tse melang linaheng,
Joale Aletareng
Re li beheng kaofela.

3
Lipalesa ka ‘nete
Lia re ruta bohle,
Li re bolella hle
Likhabiso tsa ‘nete.

4
Lerato la Molimo,
Tumelo ea ‘nete
Le bona bohloeki,
Ka tsona likhabiso.

5
Empa eena ‘M’a rona
A ke ke a rata
Masaoana ana
A fahlang batho feela.

6
Liketso tsa lerato
Re ke re li etseng;
Pelo e hloekileng
Ke eona e molemo.

7
Ka matsatsi kaofela
Khoeling ena e ntle
Re ke re phehelle
Ho hlonepha Maria.

8
Oho uena, ‘M’a rona,
Rea u rapela
U re nehe matla,
A ho fihla ho uena.

title: Re bineng ka thabo
lyrics:
Chorus
Re bineng ka thabo, ke letsatsi le letle;
Libopuoa tsohle li binele Jesu;
Kahohle le ka mehla, a bokoe a ratuoe
A re mo tlotliseng,
A re bineng Jesu,
A re bineng Jesu,

1
Molimo ea mosa o khethile sebaka
Hona mona lefatsheng ho phela le rona.
Re tsebe ka mehla ho tla fihla ho eena.
Re tle re ‘molelle seo re nang le sona.

2
Ka tlung ea Molimo, re lahlile mafifi
A tsoang ho Satane, monghali ea khopo,
‘Me ha re hlatsuoa, ra fumana leseli,
Re etsoa hona teng ban aba Molimo.

3
Ka tlung ea Morena re tla kena hangata
Re tla mamela teng lentsoe la Molimo,
Ke lona le fetang lijo tsohle tsa rona,
Le phelisang moea, le fang batho khotso.

4
Ke moo re tla ea teng ha re se re sitiloe
Re jere, ka pelong, thoto e boima,
Re tla ea ka soabo ho ipolela libe
Re battle tshwarelo ho eena Morena.

5
‘Me sejo sa ‘nete Mor’a Molimo Jesu,
O tla re fa sona ka matsatsi ‘ohle;
Ha re amohetse Sakramente e kholo
Re ka batla eng na mafatsheng kahohle?

title: Re bineng ka thabo Ngoana
lyrics:
Chorus
Re bineng ka thabo
Ngoana ea tsoaletsoeng rona;
Ke Mor’a Molimo
Kriste Morena.

1
Ka baka la rona batho
Jesu o fetoha ngoana,
O lerato le leholo!
O mosa! O mohau ho rona.

2
Satane o n’a hapile
Ba lichaba kaofela;
‘Me kajeno o soabile
O hlotsoe ke lesea lena!

3
Jesu o tlisitse khotso
Le thabo ho ba lefatshe;
O tla bula leholimo
A fenye matla a lihele.

4
Leholimong le lefatsheng
Letlotlo le be ho Jesu;
Joale le ka ho sa feleng
A bus etsa rona lipelo.

title: Re bineng Lintoa
lyrics:
e bineng lintoa le letlotlo
La ba ratileng Molimo;
Ba entsoe marena kajeno,
Ha ba sa tseba bohloko
Hlonamo e se e le sieo
Ha ba sa lakatsa letho;
Joale ba kotula ka thabo
Seo ba se jetseng ka lillo.

2
‘Me eena Morena Molimo
O iketlile ka bona;
Ba ‘mona ka mehla le mehla
Ba ithabela le eena.
Moo ba lutseng ke Paradising;
Ha ho Bosiu, ke nyene
Lebone la teng ke Konyana,
E sa le le ntse le tuka.

3
Moo ho khanya ha bo-Martiri
Ho joaloka ha letsatsi
Bakonfesore ba khothetseng
Ba letlotlong le sa feleng.
Bavirigo ba bontsha lintoa
Tseo ba li hlotseng ka mehla;
Lenyalong le tla ithabela
Ka botshepehi ba lona.

4
Moo barui bat la nyakalla
Ba ileng ba phomosetsa;
Bafumanehi ba tla rua
Ba ileng ba iphapanya.
Bona ba phetseng ka mahloko
Ba tla phomola le Jesu,
Le ba ileng ba lla meokho
Ba tshelisoa ke Molimo.

5
Lona metsoalle ea Molimo,
Le re supisitse tsela;
‘Me re rata ho le etsisa
Le re rapelle ka mehla.
Hojane re joaloka lona,
Re sebeletsa Morena,
Le re rapelleng ho Molimo,
Re be ba hae ka tumelo.

6
Lona le se le finyeletse,
Rona re sa le baeti;
Lona le lutes Paradising,
Rona re sa le mothating;
Empa ha le ntse le phela
Le ne le tshwana le rona;
Rapelang ‘Moloki oa batho,
Re tle re fihle haeso.

title: Re bineng Mikael
lyrics:
Chorus
Re bineng Mikael ea matla
Khosana ea leholimo:
O hlotse lira tsa Morena,
Ahe! Tona ea Molimo!

1
Mikael o hlotse ka ‘nete
Drakone eo e tshabehang
E boletsoeng ke Evangeli,
E matla a fetisisang.

2
Mohla Satane ea bohale.
A ikhantshetsang Molimo
Mikael a ema kapele
Le Mangeloi a molemo.

3
Ke mang ea joaloka Molimo
Ke polelo ea khosana;
‘Me Satane ea boikhatsho
A hloloa ke lentsoe lena.

4
Eaba mangeloi a molemo
A putsoa ka leholimo;
Empa lihele le tahleho
Tsa otla ‘ona a khopo.

5
Oho, Mikael ea monate,
Mothusi ea bokhabane
U re loanele hle, Morena,
Re tla u leboha bohle.

6
Lira tsa bakriste li ngata,
Li matla a fetisang;
Athe rona rea fokola,
Re ka balehela ho mang?

7
Re behile tshepo ea rona
Matsohong a hao, khosana:
Oho, Mikael ea leng matla,
U re thuse lintoeng tsena!

title: Re filoe morapelli
lyrics:
1
Re filoe morapelli
Ea tlang ho re thusa:
a re mo tshepeng ruri,
Hobane o mosa.

Chorus
Oho hle Theresia
Mothusi ea matla;
Re tla ho uena bohle,
Ak’u re rapelle.

2
Sireletsa Kereke
Litsietsing tsohle;
Thusa Morena Papa
Le balisa bohle.

3
Thusa maren’a rona
A buse ka toka,
‘Me a be lisupiso
Tsa ba ‘ona batho.

4
Sireletsa ba bacha
Ba phehelle botleng;
Re pheme le maraba
A isang bokhopong.

5
Hoopla le bakriste
Ba lefatshe lohle,
Ba phelang ka mahloko
Re qelle mamello.

6
Limishone le tsona
Li u lebeletse,
Li re u tl’o li thusa
Li tle li atlehe.

7
Se lebale likolo
Le liseminari,
Li hloiloe haholo
Ke Makomunisi.

title: Re hlonepheng
lyrics:
1
Re hlonepheng! Re adoreng!
Eena Jesu oa rona.
Re hlonepheng! Re adoreng!
Ke eena Morena.

Chorus
Binang! Binang! Hoba ke eena Jesu;
Binang! Binang! ‘Moloki oa batho.
E! ke eena Jesu!
E! ke eena Jesu!

2
Molimo ea Mosa
O tlile ho rona,
O tlisa thabo,
O felisa lillo.

3
Ho eena hle lifela tsohle
Leholimong le lefatsheng!
A re bineng le mangeloi!
Mohau oa Jesu Kriste!

title: Re ke re bineleng
lyrics:
1
Re ke re bineleng ka thabo
Ba ahileng leholimong
Bo-ntat’a rona ka tumelo
Ba amohetsoeng letlotlong.

Chorus
Re bineng hammoho ba ileng ho Molimo
Morena oa rona o ba entse Bakhethoa,
Ba tla ithabela, ‘musong oa leholimo,
Ba tla iketla teng ka mehla le mehla.

2
Re sa tsamaea har’a lintoa;
Teng ke bophelo ba rona;
Empa re talima ka mehla
Ho ba lutseng le Morena.

3
Ka bona re ithuta tsela
E isang ‘musong oa khotso
‘Me ba re sietse mehlala
E lokileng, e molemo.

4
Sesupiso se bokhabane
Se behiloe ke Molimo
Hore rona re se etsise
Ka lerato le tumelo.

5
Thuso e ‘ngoe rea e bona
Ho ba nkiloeng ke Molimo,
Baa re tseba, ‘me baa re rata.
Ke metsoalle e molemo.

6
Pel’a terone ea Morena
Ba re rapella ka mehla,
H are sitiloe baa re thusa,
Ha re lla, baa re tshelisa.

7
Oho! Metsoalle ea Molimo
Utloang thapelo tsa rona:
Re batla soabo le tumelo,
Le ligrasia tse ngata.

title: Re lehlo’nolo
lyrics:
1
Re lehlo’nolo har’a batho
Rosary e halalelang
E re tlamile ho ‘M’a Jesu
Ka mokhoa o halalelang.
Re tla etsa hantle Rosari:
Ha molomo o rapela
Pelo e tla ‘ne e hopole
Tsa Jesu le tsa Maria.

2
Nako ea mohau e fihlile,
‘Me Molimo a romela
Lengeloi la hae Gabriele
Ho Movirigo Maria;
La mo lumelisa, ‘me la re:
U tla mo emola popelong,
U tsoale Mora a inotsi
Oa Ntate ea maholimong.

3
Mohlomong Maria a tloha
A ea naheng ea maloti
A etela Elizabetha,
(Ke ‘m’a Johanne Mohlatsoi)
Eena a makala, a botsa
‘Me a re: Ho nthlahela kae?
O nketetse, ‘M’a Moren’a ka,
O ntliselitse Ngoan’a hae.

4
Eare suing bo bong bosele,
Mangeloi a tlisa thabo,
A re Bethlehema ho tsoetsoe
‘Moloki, Mor’a Molimo.
Oho Movirigo Maria
U ithabetse hakakang!
kannete, ‘Me, le ‘na ke rata
Ngoana oa hao ea ratehang.

5
Jesu a sa le monyenyane,
Movirigo a mo isa
Jerusalema, ka tempeleng
Ho mo khethela Morena.
Teng Simeoni a mo tseba,
A re: Enoa ke leseli
Le tlang ho khantshetsa lichaba,
‘Me li pholohe kannete.

6
Oho Maria le Josefa,
Joale le se belaeleng,
Hoba Ngoana Jesu ke enoa,
O phetse, o ka tempeleng,
Thusang, ‘me re tla le etsisa,
Re tla furalla lefatshe
Re batle Morena oa rona.
Re thabe ha re mo bone.

title: Re lumelloe ‘Me
lyrics:
Chorus
Re lumelloe, ‘Me ea monate,
Ho ea le uena ha eno;
Re thusoe re fihle kapele
Moo u lutseng le Jesu.

1
U lutse setulong se setle
Har’a mangeloi a Jesu
U phahamisitsoe kannete,
Re hopole rona batho.

2
Re lutse lefatsheng le lebe
Har’a licheho tse ngata.
Re ntse re le baetsalibe.
U se ke ua re tlohela.

3
Mangeloi mane leholimong
A bina lithoko tsa hao.
U le mofumahali ‘musong,
U re fumanele mohau.

4
Re thetsoa ke lira tsa rona,
Re fokolisoa ke tsona;
Li re supisa masaoana
Re fe matla ho li hlola.

5
Ka mehla u tla ithabela
U tla lula pel’a Jesu,
‘Me le uena u tla laela
Hore re kene haeso.

6
Moo le rona re tla u boka,
Re ithorise ka uena,
Re tsejoe ka mehla le mehla
Hoba re ba hao Maria.

title: Re roriseng Maria
lyrics:
Chorus
Re lumelloe, ‘Me ea monate,
Ho ea le uena ha eno;
Re thusoe re fihle kapele
Moo u lutseng le Jesu.

1
U lutse setulong se setle
Har’a mangeloi a Jesu
U phahamisitsoe kannete,
Re hopole rona batho.

2
Re lutse lefatsheng le lebe
Har’a licheho tse ngata.
Re ntse re le baetsalibe.
U se ke ua re tlohela.

3
Mangeloi mane leholimong
A bina lithoko tsa hao.
U le mofumahali ‘musong,
U re fumanele mohau.

4
Re thetsoa ke lira tsa rona,
Re fokolisoa ke tsona;
Li re supisa masaoana
Re fe matla ho li hlola.

5
Ka mehla u tla ithabela
U tla lula pel’a Jesu,
‘Me le uena u tla laela
Hore re kene haeso.

6
Moo le rona re tla u boka,
Re ithorise ka uena,
Re tsejoe ka mehla le mehla
Hoba re ba hao Maria.

title: Re tsamaeeng
lyrics:
1
Re tsamaeeng le Marena
A latelang naleli,
‘Me re tla fumana ngaoana
Ea a tsebisang ‘nete.

Chorus
Oho uena Ngoana e motle
U re rata hakakang!
Re tla u leboha bohle
Ka pelo e chesehelang.

2
E, ke Mong’a leholimo,
Tlong, le mo khumameleng;
Ke eena Mor’a Molimo,
Le ke le mo adoring.

3
Marena a Bochabela
Aa re ruta kajeno,
Ruri tumelo ea ‘ona.
E rorisoe ke batho.

4
Marena, kapele-pele
A mamela Molimo.
A tsamaea le naleli,
Ke moo a fuoang khotso.

5
‘Me le rona, ha re fuoa
Grasia ea Molimo,
Re e mameleng ka mehla,
Re be lehlohonolo.

title: Regina Coeli (U ithabele)
lyrics:
Chorus
Regina coeli laetare! Alleluia!
Quia quem meruisti portare. Alleluia!
Resurrexit sicut dixit, Alleluia!
Ora pro nobis Deum. Alleluia!
U ithabele Maria Alleluia!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

2
Hobane ea tsoetsoeng ke uena
O tsohile bafung ruri,
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleuia!

3
U re rapelle uena ‘M’a rona,
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

title: Rona sechaba
lyrics:
1
Rona sechaba sa bakriste,
Re nyakalleng hamonate;
Jesu o hlotse o tsohile
Joaloka ha a boletse.

Chorus
Moea oa ka ak’u binele
Tsoho ea Mor’a Molimo
Ho mo rata ke thabo e ntle!
Ho mo jaka ke monono!
Ho mo rata ke thabo e ntle!
Ho mo jaka ke monono.

2
Bajodi ba ne ba ikhantsha,
Ba re Jesu o s’a shoele,
Thuto ea hae ke ea bohata;
Kajeno ba thasehile.

3
Uena, Maria Madgalena,
U paki e tshepehileng;
Re re: Na u tla re bolella
Seo u se boning Tseleng?

4
Ke bone lebitla la Jesu,
Ke bone Jesu ea phelang;
O thabile oa ka ‘Moloki;
Le Mangeloi a mabeli.

5
Ke bone lesela la hloho
Le masala a hae a mang;
Ke bone Mong’a ka ka mahlo,
Ke mo utloile a mpitsa.

6
Ahe! Jesu tshepo ea ‘nete;
Ka uena re hlotse lefu;
Le rona re tla tsoha ruri
Ho ea tlotlisoa le uena.

title: Rura, rura
lyrics:
Chorus
Rura,rura lengeloi la thapelo;
Maholimong a holimo!
Isa litakatso tsa rona
Le lifela ho Josefa.

1
Oho Josefa ntat’a rona
U n’u le joaloka rona;
Kajeno u n’u re hopole
Ho Jesu u re rapelle.

2
Pelo ea hao, rea e tseba,
E monate, ‘me e mosa;
E abela bafumanehi
Menono e tsoang ho ‘Mopi.

3
Ea entseng maholimo ‘ohle
Le mafatshe le maoatle
O ile a iketsa nama
‘Me a holisoa ke uena.

4
Fatshe lena le re memela
Ho ja menate ea lona,
Oho Ntate ak’u re thuse,
Re bone hore ke chefo.

title: Sanctuari
lyrics:
Chorus
Sanctuari ena e lume
Ke lifela tse monate
Bohle mona ba iphelise
Jesu o s’a tlile ruri

1
O hona mono aletareng
Ha a bonoe, o siretsoe
Ke sebopeho sa bohobe
‘Me ke Eena ka sebele

2
Konyana e hlokang sekoli
Lerato le u hlabile
U hauhele baetsalibe
U re hlohonolofatse

3
Mali a hao a bokhabane
A tla hlakola melato
U re able ‘na bohle
Hoba ke tefo ea batho

4
‘Mele ona ke sona sejo
See re se hlokang lefatsheng
K a sona re hlola meleko
Re se ke ra oela sebeng

5
Oho! Bohobe ba Molimo
Bo nang le menate eohle
Re ke re bo jeng ka tshoanelo
Pelo li se li hloekile

title: Sebopehong sa Hostia
lyrics:
1
Sebopehong sa Hostia
Lerato la Jesu
Le siretsoe ho rona
Ke sebele sa hae
‘Me aletareng ea hae
Ke ea rona pelo

Chorus
Oho Jesu ke lumela ho uena
Empa ho ja
Nka u bona
Ke u bone ke o rate haholo
U ntumelle oho Jesu
Ke nyolehe leholimong

2
Leholimong, bakhethuoa
Ba tletsoe ke thabo
E! ka ‘nete ba rua
Ba na le Molimo
Lefa lena ke la ka
Ke bopetsoe lona

3
Ka Hostieng ke rata
Jesu, Moren’a ka
Ke tshepa leholimong
Ho ‘mona ka mehla
‘Me le lehlohonolong
Ho lula le eena

title: Sefela sa Balisana
lyrics:
1
Ka lifela tse ntle haholo
Re bineleng Molopolli
E kajeno re fuoa Eena
Eena Ngoana oa Molimo
Hoba Misseng ka nako e kholo
Bohobe bo nyametse tuu
Ho hlahile Molimo Motho
A re mo rateng le rona.

2
Balisa re ne re lisitse
Metebong har’a Maloti
Eare tsatsing le leng ra utloa
Hang khoeletso ea Ntate
A bolela a re ho rona
Tlong bohle kea le bitsa
‘Moloki o nts’a le luletse
Ke Eena Kriste Morena.

3
Kajeno re fihlile Jesu,
U re tshwarele litshito
Le baholo ba fe Tumelo
Ba re holise ka ho uena
Ba se ke ba re lahla koo
Le rona re bopetsoe Kriste
Ke Monghali oa mee’a batho
Ke Morena oa Marena.

4
Oho Jesu, Morena oa ka
Ke se ke u khumamela
Ke u nehela pelo ea ka
Lerato la hao le ntlhotse
‘Me bottle ba hao bo nkhahlile
Le ‘na ke sitoa ho hana
Ke se ke u fa moea oa ka
O be ho uena ka mehla.

title: Sehlabelong
lyrics:
1
Sehlabelong se halalelang
Jesu ‘Moloki oa rona
Ka mosa o fetisisang
O tla ho rona ka mehla.

Chorus
A re eeng bohle
Ka pelo tse ntle.
A re eeng ho mo adora
‘Me ka lerato
Le ka hlonepho
Ho ba ke eena Morena.
Hoba ke eena Morena.

2
‘Me mangeloi a leholimo,
A felehetsa Morena
A maketse a tsoa letlotlong
Ho bona Jesu le rona.

3
Ka hlompho r emo inameleng
Le ka boikokobetso;
‘me ho eena ea re ratileng
Re kopeng tsa hae lineho.

4
‘Me ea iketsang sehlabelo
Bakeng sa baetsalibe
Ke eena Mora oa Molimo,
Ke oa rona Molopolli.

5
Ke morena ea matla ‘ohle
Ea re nehang ka matsatsi
Ka sebopeho sa bohobe
‘Mele oa hae ka sebele.

6
Ba heso re mo neheng moea,
Bophelo, matla le pelo;
Ke pusetso ea mafutsana,
Empa e tla mo thabisa.

title: Thoriso, Lerato
lyrics:
Chorus
Thoriso, Lerato, hlolo, hape letlotlo,
Ke lena letsatsi la batho ea ‘nete;
Jesu o tsohile; lefu le se le hlotsoe;
Ho eena le Maria ho bineloe lithoko.

1
Jesu o tsohile, o tsohile bafung
Ka letsatsi lena kamoo a n;a boletse,
E, Morena Jesu, Monghali oa lefatshe
A ka sitoa ho lula lefung.

2
E sa le ka meso mangeloi a matle
A fihla lefatsheng, ‘me a lula lebitleng;
A re ho basali: Bolellang barutuoa,
Le re, Morena o tsohile.

3
Na Mor’a Molimo ea se nang le sebe
A ka tlamuoa joang ka litlamo tsa lefu?
Lefu le tshwanela batho ba molato,
Ke kotlo ea bona kannete.

4
Jesu o tsohile, re se re utloile
Barutuoa ba hae, re ke re beng le tshepo,
Re tla tsoha ruri ka tsatsi la bofelo,
Ha re phetha melao eohle.

title: Thoriso, Letlotlo
lyrics:
1
Thoriso, letlotlo,
Ho Jesu ea matla!
Re ‘mineleng ka thabo,
Ke eena Morena.

Chorus
O hlotse kajeno
Esita le lihele;
A re bineng Jesu,
Re beng ba hae bohle.
Alleluia! Alleluia,
Alleluia! Alleluia.

2
Thoriso, letlotlo
Ho Jesu ea mosa
Ea hlakotseng litshito
Tsa rona tse ngata.

3
Thoriso, le teboho
Ho Jesu ea fileng
Bana ba hae pholoho
Khotso e sa feleng.

4
Jesu ea monate,
Moshoeli oa rona;
Re ba hao ka sebele.
Joale le ka mehla.

title: Thota ena
lyrics:
1
Thota ena ke thota e khethiloeng
Ka sebele ke ntlo ea Molimo
Le  menate eohle ea leholimo
Ke hona moo re e abeloang teng

Chorus
Oho! bohobe ba bophelo
Ka uena ke tla ba lehlohonolo

2
Khutsang, lona hle, libopuoa tsohle
O teng ruri Mong’a leholimo
E, ke Eena, ke mona ka tumelo
Sefubeng sa ka ke mo kukile

3
Oho! Jesu, ana ho ntlhahela kae
Ke eteloe ke Molimo oa ka
U tlile ho nkhothatsa le ho mphepa
Lerato la hao le ‘makalitse

4
Oho! Ntate, ke tla u boka joang na
Hobane u nthatile hakale!
Pelo ea ka, ke u fa eona eohle
Amohela hle teboho ea ka

5
Ho felile! Ke se ke le oa Jesu
O lula ho ‘na, le ‘na ho eena
‘Me ke se ke tla mo phelela feela
Oho! Kabelo ea ka e kholo

title: Tlo hle, Moea o Halalelang
lyrics:
Chorus
Tlo hle Moea o Halalelang, Molimo oa leseli
U tla tse ba u rapelang ka lineho tsa ‘nete

1
Ako u re nehe bohlale
Bo rorisang leholimo
Hore Molimo a inotshi
E be oa rona monono

2
U re nehe le kutloisiso
Moea o tle o be matla
Hore re utloe tsa tumelo
‘Me re tshabe sebe feela

3
U re fe neho ea merero
Ka eona re khethe tsela
E tla re isa ho Molimo
‘Me re ke ra lahleha

4
U re fe matla a ho phetha
Molao o halalelang
Le khale re se ke ra hloloa
Ke lira tsee re li loantshang

5
U re rute tsebe ea ‘nete
‘Me e sa ikhohomoseng
Re tsebe Jesu a inotshi
Jesu ea re lopolotseng

6
Moea oa hao oa borapeli
O re phelise lipelo
Re fe lerato le bohloeki
Li hlokahala haholo

7
Re kopa tshabo ea Molimo
E leng qalo ea bohlale
Re tle re tshabe likahlolo
Tse tshabehang ruri tsa hae

title: Tlo ho rona
lyrics:
1
Tlo ho rona Moea o halalelang
Tlo uena  ea re bopileng
Chesa chesa  ka mollo oa lerato
Lipelo tsa bana ba hao

Chorus
Tlo ka pele, U halaletse
Tlisa khotso, le lerato
Neho e ntle, mollo o matla
U hloekise pelo tsohle

2
Tlo ho rona, re tlisetse leseli
Re tiee tseleng ya ‘nete
‘Me re hloee sebe, sera sa rona
Re rate Molimo feela

3
Tlo ho rona, uena Moea o matla
Re thuse ha re rapela
U matlafatse lipelo tsa rona
Ha re batla re fokola

4
Tlo ho rona u hlole matla ‘ohle
A lira tsa fatshe lena
Le a tse tsoang mafifing a lihele
Kapa a pelong tsa rona

title: Tlo, ‘Moloki oa rona
lyrics:
Chorus
Tlo, ‘Moloki oa rona.
U re folise lipelo,
Tlo, Morena ea matla,
Tlo ho thusa batho.

1
Na e tla be sa le re lla,
Re hloka tshepo le thuso,
Re phela ka matshwenyeho,
Tlo, ‘Moloki oa rona,
U re folise lipelo,
Tlo, Morena ea matla,
Tlo ho thusa batho.

2
U re bolelletse ruri
Hore u tla re pholosa,
U tla romela Messia
Re ntse re na le tshepo.
Hoba re ba hao ka ‘nete;
Re tlisetse pholoho,
Ho khanye letsatsi.

3
Oho Ntate, u re utloe,
Re se nyahame pelo
Rea u bitsa kajeno.
Re tshepile uena hle!
U tle ho rona kapele
Rea u bitsa bohle
U utloe, ‘Moloki.

4
Tlo u hlole lira tsohle
Tse re loantshang ka matsatsi;
Tse hlahisang litsietsi;
Re beha tshepo eohle
Matsohong a hao, Messia
U tle u re loanele
Re phele ka uena.

title: Tlo, Moea ‘Mopi
lyrics:
1
Tlo Moea ‘Mopi oa rona
Etela ea rona meea
Tlo tshele pelong tsa ba hao
Grasia tsa leholimo

2
U bitsoa Momatlafatsi
U Mpho ea Molimo ruri
Seliba, mollo, lerato
Le tlotso ea ‘meea ea batho

3
Ra-lineho tse supileng
Mono oa Molimo Ntate
Ke uena eo re ‘maletsoeng
Re fe matla le sebete

4
Kenya leseli kelellong
Tshela lerato lipelong
Re matlafatse hle ‘meleng
Ka matla a hao a sa feleng

5
Leleka sa rona sera
U re fe khotso ka mehla
Re bontshe tsela ea ‘nete
Re tle re sesefe bobe

6
Re thuse ho tseba Ntate
Hammoho le Mora oa hae
Le ho  lumela ho uena
Uen’a leng Moea oa bona

7
Ho Ntate ho isoe khanya
Le ho Mora Moreshoeli
Le ho Moea Motshelisi
Joale le ka eohle mehla

title: Tlo, Moea o halalelang
lyrics:
Chorus
Tlo, Moea o halalelang,
Tlo, Moea o halalelang,
Tlo, Mong’a lipelo!
Hotetsa lipelo tsa rona.
Tlo, Mong’a lipelo!
Hotetsa lipelo tsa rona.

1
Re se re tla utloa polelo tsa hao,
Ke tsa ‘nete, ‘me le tsa bophelo,
Li re bontsha tsela ea pholoho;
Thusa, thusa re utloe thato ea hao.
Thusa, thusa re utloe thato ea hao.

2
Ka nqa tsohle li teng lira tsa rona,
Lefatshe lena le re hloile;
Satane eena o re chehile,
Ntate, Ntate, re tshepa uena feela.
Ntate, Ntate, re tshepa uena feela.

title: Tlong bohle
lyrics:
1
Tlong bohle; bakriste, ka thabo le thoko;
Tlong bohle, tlong bohle Bethlehema
Le bone Ngoana Mong’a leholimo.
Tlong bohle ho adora,
Tlong bohle ho adora,
Tlong bohle ho adora Morena.

2
Re eena le balisa, re eeng ka phakiso
Re chakele Ngoana oa Molimo.
Lehana lena le ka leholimo.
Tlong bohle ho adora,
Tlong bohle ho adora,
Tlong bohle ho adora Morena.

3
Re tla bona khanya ea Molimo Ntate,
Nameng e fokolang e siretsoe:
Molimo Ngoana ea tlileng ho rona.
Tlong bohle ho adora,
Tlong bohle ho adora,
Tlong bohle ho adora Morena.

4
Ea ikokobetsang ka baka la rona,
O tshwanela hakakang ho ratoa.
Re tla mo rata, re tla mo khahlisa.
Tlong bohle ho adora,
Tlong bohle ho adora,
Tlong bohle ho adora Morena.

title: Tlong le utloeng
lyrics:
1
Tlong le utloeng banab’eso
Mahlomola a tshabehang,
Le tsa ho shoa ha Jesu

2
Serapeng sa Gethsemane
Pelo ea hae e ratehang
E n’e tlale masoabi.

3
Boning Judas ea leoatla
O mo eka le ka kako;
O rekisa ka eena.

4
Joale litau tse lapileng
Tsa mo tshwara tsa mot lama
Tsa mo hulela motseng.

5
Ba mo isa ho Kaifa;
Hona teng Morena Jesu
A songoa, a jabeloa.

6
Ha Pilato ea lekoala
A bapisoa le lisenyi
Barabase a khethoa.

7
O shapuoa le ka thata
Ka taelo ea Pilato;
Jesu a re lefella.

8
‘Me ‘Mopi oa leholimo
O se a rereloa lefu,
Lefu la sefapano.

9
A roesoa mofapahloho
Oa meutloa e bohloko;
‘Me bam o hlobolisa.

10
Ba se ba ea mo jarisa
Sefate sa sehlabelo
O s’a ea re hlabeloa.

11
Jesu o khothomelletsoa
Thabeng eane ea Golgotha,
Moo a s’a tla re shoela.

12
‘Me holim’a sefapano
Mong’a rona a thakhisoa
A lerato! lerato!

13
Tsatsi le se le fifala,
Fatshe lea sisinyeha
Le llela Mong’a lona.

14
‘Me le rona, banab’eso,
Re se ke ra thatafala,
Re hlomoheng lipelo.

title: Tlong, re hateng
lyrics:
1
Tlong, re hateng, banab’eso
Mehlaleng eohle ea Jesu
Ea jereng sefapano

2
‘Me bohle re tla ithuta
Hobane libe tsa rona
Li tshoanela tefelo

3
Utloang, Bajodi ba qosa
Lefu la Jesu ka matla
Ka khotla ha Pilato

4
Bonang, Jesu o jarisoa
Sefate see se  boima
Sefate sa topollo

5
Jonna! Jesu har’a tsela
O khathetse, ‘me o oela
Ka tlas’a sefapano

6
Joale ‘M’a hae o khahlana
Le Jesu ka tsatsi lena
La lefu le la lillo

7
Hona moo, Jesu a thusoa
Ke Simone oa Sirena
Ho jara sefapano

8
Veronika o s’a fohla
Masole ho tla hlakola
Sa Jesu sefahleho

9
Jesu o oa la bobeli
Har’a tsela ‘me Bajodi
Ba mo tsosa ka chapo

10
Jesu o re: Se keng la lla
Lona ba Jerusalema
Basadi ba molemo

11
Jesu hape a khathala
Ke la boraro a oela
Tseleng ee ea mahloko

12
Re pateng mahlo a rona
Re se boneng Jesu mona
Ea amohoang likobo

13
Eaba ba nka lithakhisa
Ba mo khokhothella thata
Holim’a sefapano

14
Joo! re fihlile moo Jesu
A shoang ka baka la batho
Ba sitetsoeng Molimo

15
‘Me Bajodi ba fanyolla
Setopo see sa Morena
Ba se busetsa ‘M’a hae

16
Josefa a nka sotopo
A se pata ka linoko
Bitleng la hae le lecha

17
Joale rona, banab’eso
Re etseng pallo ho Jesu
Ea pako le tefelo

title: Tlotlo le be ho Molimo
lyrics:
1
Tlotlo le be ho Molimo
Ea busang maholimong
Khotso e be teng lefatsheng
Ho batho ba lokileng
Re u boka ka thabo
Re phehella thorisong
Gloria! Gloria! in excelsis Deo!

Re ntse re u khumamela
Ka tumelo e phelang
A re rosiseng Molimo
Tebohong e sa feleng
U mohloli e moholo
Ea busang maholimong
Gloria! Gloria! in excelsis Deo!

Jesu mora oa Molimo
U konyana e tlosang
Libe tsa lefatshe lohle
Re batla ho u rata
U re hauhele bohle
Ba llang mona lefatsheng
Gloria! Gloria! in excelsis Deo!

title: Tsatsi le teng
lyrics:
1
Tsatsi le teng la kahlolo
La bohale le la tshabo
La phethetso ea Molimo

2
Re tla utloa phala e lla
Ka nqa tsohle tsa mabitla
E tla phutha ba lichaba

3
Fatshe lena le tla tsota
Lefu lona le tla soaba
Hoba bafu ba tla tsoha

4
‘Me mabitla a tla buloa
Le masapo a kopane
Batho bohle ba tla phuthoa

5
Ho tla ba joang ha ke bona
Moahloli a nts’a e-tla
Ho re qosa le ka thata

6
Buka joale e tla tlisoa
Moo liketso tsee tsa rona
Li tla baloa ke Morena

7
Joale pontsheng li tla hlaha
Taba tsena tse mpe feela
Tse patiloeng ha re phela

8
Moemeli re tla batla
Ea ka tsebang ho re tlatsa
Empa o tla hlokahala

9
Ke moo Jesu a tla beha
linku tsohong le letona
Poli tsona li tla lahloa

10
Ke utloa lentsoe le thata
Tlohang ho ‘na tlohang lona
Le eeng mollong, le eeng ho cha!

11
Lentsoe le leng le bolela
Le tleng ho ‘na bana ba ka
‘Musong oa ka ho phomola

12
Sefapanong ua pholosa
Lesholu le shoang le uena
Oho! Jesu, nthuse le ‘na!

title: Tsatsi lena lea tshabeha
lyrics:
1
Tsatsi lena lea tshabeha
Le boletsoeng ke Davida,
Ha lefatshe le senyeha.

2
A molumo o tshabehang,
Mohla Moahloli a tlang
Ho ahlola tsa ba sebang.

3
Re tla utloa phala e lla
Ka nqa tsohle tsa mabitla
E tla phutha ba lichaba.

4
Lefu lona le tla tsota
Ha ho tsoha libopuoa
Tse phuthetsoeng ho ahloloa.

5
Joale buka e tla tlisoa
Moo ho ngotsoeng ketso tsa ka;
‘Me tsohle ke tla li botsoa.

6
Moahloli o tla lula;
Tse patiloeng li tla hlaha,
Ho se letho le tla sala.

7
Ke tla re’ng, ke le mohloko?
Ke batle kae moemeli,
Ha ho tshoha le ‘moloki!

8
Oho! Morena oa ho loka,
Ea pholosang batho feela,
Ka mohau nthuse le ‘na.

9
Hoopla hle, Jesu oa ka,
U tsoaletsoe ho mpholosa
U se ntahle tsatsing lena.

10
Ka ho mpatla, ua khathala
Ua ntopolla ka ho nchoela,
Na u shoetse lefeela na?

11
Moahloli oa phetheho
Mphe grasia ea tshwarelo,
Pele ho ea potso nako.

12
Ka molato kea inyatsa,
Sefahlehong kea fubeloa,
U ntshwarele Moren’a ka.

13
Ua lokolla Magdalena,
Le lesholu ua le utloa
‘Me u ile ua ntshepisa.

14
Kea rapela, kea fokola.
Empa uena, etsa mosa,
U se nkise mollong ho cha.

15
Mpehe tsohong le letona.
Har’a linku tsa Morena,
Lipoling ke se ke ka baloa.

16
Ha ba khopo ba akheloa
Liheleng le bademone,
U mpitsa le bakhethuoa.

17
Ke kopa ka nyenyefalo,
Ka pelo e tletseng soabo,
Nthuse tsatsing la bofelo.

18
A letsatsi la meokho
Ha motho oa mefokolo
A tla bona moahloli.

19
Mo tshwarele, oho Morena,
Le uena Jesu ea mosa
Ak’u mo fe ho phomola.

title: Tshepo ea rona
lyrics:
Chorus
Tshepo ea rona
Ea Basotho
Ke Maria
Tshepo ea Lesotho.

1
Le tsebeng hle bahedene ba batho
Ha le bona ‘M’a rona Maria
Hoba eena ha a khese ba batsho,
Ke ‘M’a lona. ‘M’a lona Bakoena.

2
Baroma hle, re emeng ka bohale
Re se tshabeng ho tshepa Maria;
Thuto ena ke thuto ea sebele;
Ke Maria thebe ea Baroma.

3
Ha le utloa tsa Maria kajeno,
Etsang pallo ea ho mo hlonepha.
Le lahleng tsa bahedene lithatho
Tshwantsho sa hae ke thatho ea rona.

4
Re qetella ka ho kopela batho
Thuso tsa hao, hoba re tshoha
Ha re bona sechaba sa Lesotho
Se sa tsebe thoko tsa Maria.

title: U binele
lyrics:
1
U binele leme la ka
Misteri e tsotehang
Ea ‘Mele o adorehang
Le Mali a bohlokoa
A tsholotsoeng ke Morena
Ho lopolla lefatshe

2
Movirigo a re tsoalla
Ngona ea leng ‘Moloki
Eena o tlile ho jala
Lentsoe la Evangeli
‘Me a qetella bophelo
Ka ketso ea mohlolo

3
A ena le barutuoa
Bosiung ba qetello
A phethisa ka molao
Mokete oa Paseka
A ntoo iphetola sejo
Se nehoang barutuoa

4
Lentsoe le ikentseng nama
Ka lentsoe le fetola
Bohobe nama ka ‘nete
Le eona veine mali
‘Me ha pono e haelloa
Tumelo e kholise

5
Re adoreng kaofela
Sakramente e kalo
‘Me ea khale ponahatso
E kesuthele e ncha
‘Me tumelo e tlatsetse
Ha kelello e hlotsoe

6
Le ho Ntate le ho Mora
Thoriso le nyakallo
Pholoho, hlompho le matla
Hammoho le tlotliso
Rorisang ka ho lekana
Moea o tsoang ho bona

title: U nke pelo ea ka
lyrics:
1
U nke pelo ea ka
Oho ‘Me ea monate
E se e khathetse
E se e fokotse
Ke neng e mamela
Litaba tsa lefatshe
Kajeno e hlotse
E tla ema ruri

Chorus
Oho Mofumahali
Re se re mathela ho uena
U tla re matlafatsa
Re be ba hao ka matsatsi

2
Ho monate ho ‘na
Ho ipeha ho uena
Na nka hloka eng na
Ha u ka nkalosa?
Ke uena molis’a mosa
Re tla u mamela
Re tla u hlonepha

3
Kahohle, ka mehla
Re fumana tsietsi
Hobane lefatsheng
Li teng lira tse mpe
U etse ka matla
Oho, Mofumahali
Re phele ka ‘nete
Re le ba hao ruri

4
Mane leholimong
U ba fetile bohle
U re hopole hle
Re tle re pholohe
E tl’e re letlotlong
U re rapelle bohle
Re tle re fihlele
Setulose setle

title: U tle, uena Messia
lyrics:
Chorus
U tle, uena Messia
U tlo re ntsha mahlomoleng
U tle ho re pholosa
Re ba u tshepileng

1
U theohe, tlo ka pele
Batho ke ba na ba eshoa
Lona lefu la bobeli
U tle uena Messia
U tlo re ntsha mahlomoleng
U tle ho re pholosa
Re ba u tshepileng

2
Oho, Ntate, se halefe
Bona meokho ea rona
Oho! tlo ho re loanela
Lihele li tlokile
‘Me li tlile ho re loantsha
Tlo, u loele lefatshe
Le se ke la fela

3
U mamele, batho baa lla
Ba buseletse letlotlo
Lee ba feletsoeng ke lona
Oho! Ba na le tshepo
U ba tshoarele, Morena
Ba folise matsoalo
Ke moo ba tla phela

title: Utloang bohle
lyrics:
Chorus
Utloang bohle!
Balisana; tsohang kapele,
Molimo o theohile
Ho ka ba hobe ho robala
Tsohang! Jesu o thehile.

1
Ke eena mong’a lintho tsohle
O hopotse ba lefatshe;
O s’a tla re pholosa bohle
Re se ke ra shoela sebeng.

2
Pholoho ena ke ea ‘nete:
O ntse a tshwana le rona;
O nkile bopeho sa sebe,
Ho se lefela ka matla.

3
Ha a qala feela ho phela
O qala ho ba bohlokong;
O tla tsamaea tseleng ena
Ka mehla ho isa lefung.

4
Letlotlo le be ho Molimo
Lefatsheng le maholimong,
A re leboheng hle lerato
Le sa fetoeng ke la e mong.

title: Utloang hle Mangeloi
lyrics:
1
Utloang hle, mangeloi a matle,
Utloang thapelo ea bana
Ba khumameng ba re ho lona:
Oho le re rapelleng!

Chorus
Oho le re rapelleng!
Oho le re rapelleng!

2
Lona le lulang leholimong
Pel’a Molimo oa rona,
Le hopoleng ban aba lona,
Oho, le re rapelleng!

3
Lona le boning halelele
Lotlotlong la Moren’a ka:
Ho halalele Ntat’a rona!
Oho, le re rapelleng!

4
Lona le tlileng ka lebitleng
Mohl’a tsoho ea Morena
Le tla bona tsoho ea rona:
Oho, le re rapelleng!

5
Lona le ileng la bolela
Tsoalo ea ‘Moloki oa ka
Mane, naheng ea Bethlehema,
Oho, le re rapelleng!

6
Lona, balebeli ba battle
Le re joentsheng hantle tsela
Ea ho loka lefatsheng lena;
Oho, le re rapelleng!

7
Lona, le thabang hamonate
Ha Molimo a re rata,
A tshwarela lib etsa rona,
Oho, le re rapelleng!

8
Lona le loantshang ka matsatsi
Lira tse batlang ho re ja
Le re sireletse ka mehla
Oho, le re rapelleng!

9
Lona, le tla lula lekhotleng
Mohla kahlolo ea rona
Re thuseng, re fihle ho lona,
Oho, le re rapelleng!

title: Utloang, Bara le Barali
lyrics:
Chorus
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

1
Utloang bara le barali,
Jesu ka lena letsatsi,
Bafung o tsohile ruri. Alleluia!

2
Salome le ‘m’a Jakobo,
Le khaitseli ea Lazaro,
Ba ea ho tlotsa setopo. Alleluia!

3
Barutuoa ha ba utloa
Ka Maria Magdalena,
Ba ea ho bona lebitla. Alleluia!

4
‘Me Joannes ka sebele,
A hl’a siea Piterose,
A fihla lebitleng pele. Alleluia!

5
Bolellang Baapostola:
Jesu ha a sa le mona,
Le tla ‘mona Galelia. Alleluia!

6
Moo ho lutseng barutuoa.
Ha hlaha Kriste ka nama,
A re: Khotso hle ho lona. Alleluia!

7
Thomas a utloa mohlolo,
Oa ea Moren’a hae tsoho,
A mpa a hloka tumelo. Alleluia!

8

Bona, Thomas, bona pelo,
Bona, matsoho le maoto,
‘Me u tlose pelaelo. Alleluia!

9
Thomas a bona maqeba,
A khumamela Morena,
A re: U Molimo oa ka. Alleluia!

10
Ruri ba lehlohonolo,
Bona ba nang le tumelo,
Ba tla fumana bophelo. Alleluia!

11
Ka mokete oa Paseka,
Ithabeleng koafela,
‘Me le leboheng Morena. Alleluia!

12
A re leboheng Molimo.
Ka baka la ligrasia
Tseo a re fileng tsona. Alleluia!
